Container.Name: unpackerr
Container.Overview:
Archive download extractor, integrates with the starr apps and your download folders. This application will automatically poll all configured starr apps to check for downloads. When a completed download contains an archive, this application will extract the file and move the extracted contents back into the download location. Files will be extracted recursively in an attempt to get all subtitles. After the starr app imported it's files, the extracted data will bet removed for cleanup. It will also check configured folders, and extract archives it finds in there.
Preconfigured to work with my media center guide.

Config.Name: Extract Torrents From
Config.Description: Manual torrents path. - Remove when not using using torrents.

Config.Name: Extract Torrents To
Config.Description: Manual torrents extract path. - Remove when not using using torrents.

Config.Name: Extract NZBs From
Config.Description: Manual nzbs path. - Remove when not using using nzbs.

Config.Name: Extract NZBs To
Config.Description: Manual nzbs extract path. - Remove when not using using nzbs.

Config.Name: Sonarr API Key
Config.Description: Sonarr API Key - Remove all sonarr references (check advanced) or keep default when not using Sonarr.

Config.Name: Sonarr4K API Key
Config.Description: Sonarr4K API Key - Remove all sonarr4k references (check advanced) or keep default when not using Sonarr4K.

Config.Name: Global Timeout
Config.Description: UN_TIMEOUT - How long to wait for the apps to respond to API requests. Recommend 10-15s

Config.Name: Parallel Extractions
Config.Description: UN_PARALLEL - Most setups will not benefit from more than 1. Recommend 1

Config.Name: Polling Interval
Config.Description: UN_INTERVAL - How often to talk to Sonarr, Radarr and Lidarr. Recommend 1-4m

Config.Name: Delete Delay
Config.Description: UN_DELETE_DELAY - How long to wait before deleting extracted files. Recommend 5-30m

Config.Name: Start Delay
Config.Description: UN_START_DELAY - How long to wait before extracting completed downloads. Recommend 1m for local and 5m+ for remote

Config.Name: Retry Delay
Config.Description: UN_RETRY_DELAY - How long to wait before retrying failed extractions. Recommend 5m

Config.Name: Log File Path
Config.Description: Logs will be written to this path if provided. Recommended, but required.

Config.Name: Debug Log Output
Config.Description: UN_DEBUG - Turns on more logs. You should use this at least once so you know what it does.

Config.Name: Sonarr URL
Config.Description: Sonarr URL

Config.Name: Sonarr Torrent Path
Config.Description: Path to find Sonarr torrents.

Config.Name: Sonarr NZB Path
Config.Description: Path to find Sonarr nzbs.

Config.Name: Sonarr4K URL
Config.Description: Sonarr4K URL.

Config.Name: Sonarr4K Torrent Path
Config.Description: Path to find Sonarr4K torrents.

Config.Name: Sonarr4K NZB Path
Config.Description: Path to find Sonarr4K nzbs.
